name: playful-geometric
description: Memphis-inspired. Hard pop shadows. Bouncy interactions. Confetti palette.

name: minimalist-monochrome
description: Editorial luxury design. Pure black and white only. Oversized Playfair Display serif. Hard section rules. Inversion as the only emphasis. No shadows, no radius, no color.

name: linear-modern
description: Cinematic dark UI with ambient blob lighting, mouse-tracking spotlights, layered shadows, and expo-out micro-interactions. The Linear/Vercel/Raycast aesthetic.

name: neo-brutalism
description: Digital punk rebellion against polished SaaS. Thick black borders. Hard ink shadows. Mechanical button press. Cream canvas. Space Grotesk Black. Loud, raw, confident.

name: botanical-organic
description: A digital ode to nature. Warm alabaster canvas, Playfair Display with italic emphasis, arch-shaped images, slow graceful motion, paper grain texture, and green-tinted diffused shadows. Whispers rather than shouts.
